pages.text: Luckily for you, wandering clerics are devoted collectors of music discs and will trade duplicates with you. With some patience you should be able to complete your collection.

Wandering clerics roam the world in the same way as their hillbilly relatives (the one with blue robe and llamas). It is easy to distinguish them - wandering cleric is bald and quite handsome. $(br2) $(br2)$(#559944)note to modders: you can easily add your own discs through IMC.$(reset)
